mapper.select: select cateId as boardCateId, parentId as boardParentId, cateNm as boardCateNm, cateDepth as boardCateDepth from boardCategory order by cateId
select cateNm as boardCateNm from boardCategory where cateId = #{boardCateId}

select b.boardNo, case when b.cateId ='00000' then '(익명)' else boardWriter end as boardWriter, b.boardTitle, DATE_FORMAT(boardDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as boardDate, b.cateId as boardCateId from board b where b.cateId = #{boardCateId} order by b.boardNo desc

select boardNo, case when cateId ='00000' then '(익명)' else boardWriter end as boardWriter, boardTitle, DATE_FORMAT(boardDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as boardDate, boardContent as boardContent, cateId as boardCateId from board where cateId = #{boardCateId} and boardNo = #{boardNo}
